【考法 1】 vt. 推测，揣测： to take to be true on the basis of insufficient evidence
【例】 I speculate that someone has been using this cabin as a trysting place. 我猜测有情侣把这个小屋当做他们幽会的地方。
【近】 assume, conjecture, daresay, imagine, presume, speculate, suppose, surmise, suspect
【反】 prove, substantiate, validate 证明

【考法 2】 vi. 投机倒卖： to buy or sell in expectation of profiting from market fluctuations
【例】 speculating on the oil market 在石油市场上投机倒卖

【记】 spect 看 + calculate 算计→仔细看，并且心里算计→沉思，怎么买卖股票投机
